```{r}

```

```{r}

```

```{r}
# Convert the price column using parse_number
data <- data %>%
  mutate(price = parse_number(price))
```

```{r}
str(data)
head(data)
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(data$service.fee))
nrow(data)

# Count occurrences of "0" in the column
count_zeros <- sum(data$service.fee == 0)

# Print the count
print(count_zeros)
```
